content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  April 03 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB+' rating to the senior unsecured notes due 2027 being issued by Essex Portfolio  L.P. A full list of Fitch's ratings for Essex Portfolio  L.P. and Essex Property Trust (NYSE:ESS) follows at the end of this release.
